socialSupportFormWizard.title: Social Support Application
socialSupportFormWizard.thankYouMessage: Thank you for completing the application form. Your information has been saved.
socialSupportFormWizard.submitError: Failed to submit form. Please try again.
socialSupportFormWizard.missingDataError: Some required form data is missing.
socialSupportFormWizard.validationError: Please fill in all required fields
socialSupportFormWizard.saveConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to save this data?

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nationalIdMinLength: National ID must be at least 5 characters
validation.nationalIdMaxLength: National ID must not exceed 20 characters
validation.dateOfBirthPast: Date of birth must be in the past
validation.dateOfBirthNotTooOld: Date of birth must be within reasonable range (not older than 120 years)
validation.addressMinLength: Address must be at least 5 characters
validation.cityMinLength: City must be at least 2 characters
validation.stateMinLength: State must be at least 2 characters
validation.countryMinLength: Country must be at least 2 characters
validation.dependentsNoLeadingZeros: Number should be 0 or start with 1-9
validation.monthlyIncomeMin: Monthly Income must be at least 0
validation.monthlyIncomeNoLeadingZeros: Number should be 0 or start with 1-9

aiPrompts.currentFinancialSituation: Describe your current financial situation in detail, including your income sources, monthly expenses, and any financial challenges you are facing.
aiPrompts.employmentCircumstances: Describe your current employment circumstances, including your job status, work hours, type of employment, and any employment-related challenges you are experiencing.
aiPrompts.reasonForApplying: Write a description of why someone is applying for social support.
aiPrompts.expandPrompt: The user has already written: "{{currentValue}}". Please expand or improve this description.
aiPrompts.expandPromptShort: The user has already written: "{{currentValue}}". Please expand or improve this.
